name: AWS S3 Compatible
description: This plugin is used to deliver web transactions data to AWS S3 compatible platform. To access the plugin, you would need the credentials of AWS S3 compatible device.

configuration.label: AWS Access Key ID (Public Key)
configuration.description: AWS S3 access key id for AWS S3 authentication.

configuration.label: AWS Secret Access Key (Private Key)
configuration.description: AWS S3 secret access key for AWS S3 authentication.

configuration.label: Bucket Name
configuration.description: Bucket Name in which the data object will be stored.

configuration.label: Object Prefix
configuration.description: Object prefix for the data object name while pushing it to AWS S3.

configuration.label: Maximum File Size (in MBs)
configuration.description: Maximum size of data object to be stored in the bucket. (Value should be between 0 to 100.)

configuration.label: Maximum Duration (in Seconds)
configuration.description: Maximum duration after which the data object should be stored in the bucket.
